long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly view shared videos in fullscreen on Google Chat to catch every detail! With a single click, this extension maximizes videos, making it easier to see finer points in presentations, demos, or shared media without distractions.
